skillTree.name: Thick Skin
skillTree.description: At times, this servant of Khorne storms across the battlefield with arrows lodged in his chest. However, they seem to do little but further stoke the raging fire of his wrath.

skillTree.name: Hates Slaanesh
skillTree.description: Fluttering and flouncing into battle is the way of the weak and self-indulgent. War should be waged Kharneth's way – with pure, unbridled savagery.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Slaaneshi factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Slaaneshi factions

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Call of the Hunt
skillTree.description: When Karanak finds his prey other Flesh Hounds appear beside him, drawn to the battlefield by the glory of the hunt.

ui_effects.description: Summons a unit of Flesh Hounds of Khorne
Activates automatically when conditions are met

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 for Flesh Hounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

Physical Resistance: +15 for Flesh Hounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Unflagging Hunter
skillTree.description: The hunt begins as Karanak's three snouts taste the air for a trace of his prey. He paces to and fro, growling and snarling as each head in turn savours a portion of the scent. Each can track Karanak's quarry in a different fashion.

skillTree.name: Hound of Vengeance
skillTree.description: The first head can follow the trail through space and can track the victim over plain, forest, mountain, and other environments too bizarre to describe.

skillTree.name: Endless Hunter
skillTree.description: The second can follow the scent through time, back into the past to the very creation of everything that is, or forward to the end of the universe.

effects.description:
Skulls gained from kills: +8%
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Talon of the Skull Throne
skillTree.description: The final head tracks the quarry through his own thoughts, pursuing through dreamscapes and delusions. Of the three heads it is the last that is most dangerous, for the first two can be fooled by those with the wit to do so, but only the insane can run beyond the trace of their own mind.

skillTree.name: Greater Locus of Fury
skillTree.description: The most powerful of the Lord of Battle's daemons act as consuits to his hellish domain in the Realm of Chaos. The rageful energies that radiate from these champions rouse all entities born of that dread place to acts of unparalleled savagery.

skillTree.name: Feast of Blood
skillTree.description: When the bloodlust and frenzy are at their utmost levels, minor wounds are healed by the Blood God's towering, unassailable will.

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

skillTree.name: Brutal Charge
skillTree.description: When a huge swathe of rage and violence descends upon the unready, very few survivors are left in its wake.

skillTree.name: Maim!
skillTree.description: No foe remains a threat once torn limb from bloody limb!

skillTree.name: Kill!
skillTree.description: "KILL! KILL THEM ALL!"

skillTree.name: Destroy!
skillTree.description: "Raze it all to the ground! Leave nothing standing!"

skillTree.name: Slaughter!
skillTree.description: With every other thought squeezed from his mind, there is naught left of this one but the screaming song of slaughter.

skillTree.name: Murder!
skillTree.description: Death, malice, butchery and murder – the enemies of Khorne shall have it all.

skillTree.name: Hunt!
skillTree.description: "None shall run far! None shall be able to hide! All will come to sufferance!"

skillTree.name: Cleave!
skillTree.description: "Modulistic terror – a vast, sadistic feast. The only way to exit is going piece by piece."

skillTree.name: Crush!
skillTree.description: All will know agony, pulverised by the inescapable grip of the Blood God's hatred.

skillTree.name: Prey of the Blood God
skillTree.description: Karanak is Khorne's chosen hunter, unleashed to search out those who have offered insult to his colossal pride.

effects.description: Unique ability: "Prey of the Blood God"

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Increase Mobility
skillTree.description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Spread Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Khorne corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Khorne corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Khorne corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Talon of the Skull Throne
backgroundSkills.description: Greatest of the Flesh Hounds, Karanak is the three-headed guard-beast that prowls the throne room of Khorne. Ever watchful, ever hungry, he is the physical manifestation of the Blood God's wrathful vengeance.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Flesh Hounds of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

effects.description: Unique ability: "Brass Collar of Bloody Vengeance"

items.name: Brass Collar of Bloody Vengeance
items.description: Karanak's Collar of Khorne is thicker and heavier than those of his pack. Enchantments of spite are layered over those of abjuration, making the hound almost immune to callow sorcery.
